scripts.fbuild: parcel build src/ts/content.ts src/ts/background.ts && python tools/packaging.py firefox
scripts.cbuild: parcel build src/ts/content.ts src/ts/background.ts && python tools/packaging.py chrome
scripts.fbuildns: parcel build src/ts/content.ts src/ts/background.ts --no-source-maps && python tools/packaging.py firefox
scripts.cbuildns: parcel build src/ts/content.ts src/ts/background.ts --no-source-maps && python tools/packaging.py chrome
